SEARCH
Package account

Class ForeignX

java.lang.Object
account.ForeignX
public class ForeignX extends Object
ForeignX class is used to store information of the user's foreign currency balance of different currencies It also stores the currency rates from SGD to different countries The class is connected to the Account class as it uses the same account ID to perform the transactions for foreign exchange

  • Constructor Details

    • ForeignX

      public ForeignX(int accountID, float balance)
      Special class constructor for class private attributes
      Parameters:
      accountID - unique identifier for different FX accounts
      balance - the current balance of the user's account It fetches the data from FXacc CSV containing the accountID and the balance of the different currencies By iterating through the csv, we use the accountID to retrieve the balances and assign them to the private attributes It calls the Foreign currencies class to retrieve the latest currency rates

  • Method Details

    • getCurrencyCode

      public String getCurrencyCode()
      getCurrencyCode returns the currency code of the country
      Returns:
      String of the Currency Code

    • setCurrencyCode

      public void setCurrencyCode(String CurrencyCode)
      setCurrencyCode sets the latest currency code
      Parameters:
      CurrencyCode - sets the code of the currency from a specific country

    • getExchangeRate

      public float getExchangeRate()
      getExchangeRate returns the exchange rate of the country
      Returns:
      float value of the currency rate

    • setExchangeRate

      public void setExchangeRate(float ExchangeRate)
      setExchangeRate sets the latest exchange rate
      Parameters:
      ExchangeRate - sets the rate of the currency from a specific country

    • ForeignCurrencies

      public void ForeignCurrencies()
      ForeignCurrencies() reads the data from FX csv to retrieve the latest currency rates A dictionary is created to store the values to the specific currency for efficiency By initializing the currencies as "Keys", we can access the values of the currency assigned

    • printCurrencies

      public void printCurrencies()
      printCurrencies() prints the details of the specific account and its balances The balances consist of the SGD, USD, MYR, JPY, AUD and GBP currencies

    • viewCurrencies

      public void viewCurrencies()
      viewCurrencies() is for the purpose of printing the latest currency rates for user to keep up to date It prints out the dictionary in a form of a 'key : value'

    • convertInput

      public static String convertInput(int input)
      The convertInput method is to convert the user's input from the menu page to specify the currency they want to exchange to
      Parameters:
      input - the specific input of a user from a menu
      Returns:
      the value of the currency being used for the methods in this class Switch and case is used here for returning different values based on the user's input

    • exchangeToForeign

      public void exchangeToForeign(float amount, int exchangeChoice)
      exchangeToForeign is a method for exchanging an amount from the user's balance to the foreign currency
      Parameters:
      amount - the value input by the user to exchange to the foreign currency
      exchangeChoice - the input that is made by the user to specify the type of foreign currency By using dictionary, we retrieve the currency rate of the user's choice The amount of the user's account will be reduced and that amount is used for the exchange By having switch and case, we update the balance of the foreign currency that the user has exchanged for

    • exchangeToSGD

      public void exchangeToSGD(float amount)
      exchangeToSGD is a method for exchanging an amount from the specific foreign currency of the user's choice to SGD
      Parameters:
      amount - the value inputted by the user to exchange to SGD It prints out the current balances of the foreign currencies for the user's input Switch and case is used for doing the update of the user's balance and foreign balance based on the input After exchange is successful, it will print the latest balance of the account

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Testing main function
